1037860.name: Shadows of Adam - The Official Player's Guide
1037860.description:
The Shadows of Adam - The Official Player's Guide is comprised of 60 full-color pages, complete with boss strategies, item tables, fabled secrets and full area maps. No Shadows of Adam collection is complete without this Official Player's Guide!

  • Area Maps - Detailed maps with tons of callouts to treasure, interesting NPCs and even secret paths!
  • Boss Strategies - Detailed boss strategies written by the developers and members of the Shadows of Adam community to help take your game to the next level.
  • Weapon, Armor and Item Tables - Crunchy data on all of the equipment available in Shadows of Adam!
  • Bestiary - Tables containing monster data for all enemies in Shadows of Adam!
  • Puzzle Solutions - Puzzle solutions in video form, so you will never get stuck!
